}} "'Leaving'" is a song by English electronic music duo Pet Shop Boys from
their eleventh studio album, [[Elysium (Pet Shop Boys album)|Elysium]]. It was
released as the album's second single on 12 October 2012. It entered
the UK Singles Chart at number 44.
